<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128" lineLink="#a4fb27fac71c41b0d9873024cbbd12bc6"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/passsupport-h/#af807c9595d50b45c0008924c4679c85c">INITIALIZE&#95;PASS</a>(LocalStackSlotPass, <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/genericcycleimpl-h/#ad78e062f62e0d6e453941fb4ca843e4d">DEBUG&#95;TYPE</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><Highlight kind="normal">                </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Local Stack Slot Allocation&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><Highlight kind="normal">bool LocalStackSlotImpl::runOnMachineFunction(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp;MF) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo">MachineFrameInfo</a> &amp;MFI = MF.getFrameInfo();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetregisterinfo">TargetRegisterInfo</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a0f36ed1bc17fc1aa97fe291c439a0698">TRI</a> = MF.getSubtarget().getRegisterInfo();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LocalObjectCount = MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo/#ac51e2d34abb79b72afef355fac525c76">getObjectIndexEnd</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the target doesn&#39;t want/need this pass, or if there are no locals</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to consider, early exit.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LocalObjectCount == 0 || !<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a0f36ed1bc17fc1aa97fe291c439a0698">TRI</a>-&gt;requiresVirtualBaseRegisters(MF))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Make sure we have enough space to store the local offsets.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><Highlight kind="normal">  LocalOffsets.resize(MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo/#ac51e2d34abb79b72afef355fac525c76">getObjectIndexEnd</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Lay out the local blob.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><Highlight kind="normal">  calculateFrameObjectOffsets(MF);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Insert virtual base registers to resolve frame index references.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> UsedBaseRegs = insertFrameReferenceRegisters(MF);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Tell MFI whether any base registers were allocated. PEI will only</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// want to use the local block allocations from this pass if there were any.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Otherwise, PEI can do a bit better job of getting the alignment right</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// without a hole at the start since it knows the alignment of the stack</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// at the start of local allocation, and this pass doesn&#39;t.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><Highlight kind="normal">  MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo/#a37cfdca2465d899059663518672882b0">setUseLocalStackAllocationBlock</a>(UsedBaseRegs);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Scan the function&#39;s instructions looking for frame index references.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For each, ask the target if it wants a virtual base register for it</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We need to keep the references to the stack protector slot through frame</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// index operands so that it gets resolved by PEI rather than this pass.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="422"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// processed all FrameRefs before this one, just check whether or not</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
